pr_title: grpc: fix a test failure on java 8

timeline.message:
SSL context should not be applied to a plain connection

SSL context should not be applied to plain connections

Restore the orginal configuration

timeline.bodyText: This is correct - the usePlaintext="true" cancels out the sslRef="CustomSSLSettings" - but this will be confusing to anyone looking at this test in the future.  Can you additionally remove the sslRef, or add a comment about these canceling out?
timeline.author: wtlucy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@

+<server description="Basic gRPC with security constraints">
+    <featureManager>
+        <feature>grpc-1.0</feature>
+        <feature>grpcClient-1.0</feature>
+        <feature>appSecurity-2.0</feature>
+    </featureManager>
+    
+    <grpcClient host="*" sslRef="CustomSSLSettings" usePlaintext="true" />
